tasks.name: Create a presentation for the Board of management

milestones.name: Set up Python Environment
milestones.description: Download and install Python 3.x on your system. Choose a suitable IDE (e.g., VS Code, PyCharm) and install it.  Test the installation by running a simple 'Hello, world!' program.

milestones.name: Learn Basic Syntax and Data Types
milestones.description: Complete an online course or tutorial covering variables, data types (integers, floats, strings, booleans), operators, and basic input/output. Practice with numerous simple exercises.

milestones.name: Master Control Flow (if/else, loops)
milestones.description: Learn about conditional statements (if, elif, else) and loops (for, while). Practice with coding exercises involving these concepts, focusing on problem-solving.

milestones.name: Introduction to Data Structures (Lists, Dictionaries)
milestones.description: Understand and practice using lists and dictionaries.  Work through coding exercises involving manipulating and accessing data within these structures.

milestones.name: Functions and Modules
milestones.description: Learn how to define and use functions. Explore importing and using built-in and external modules (e.g., `math`, `random`).  Practice creating modular code.

milestones.name: Simple Project: Number Guessing Game
milestones.description: Design and implement a simple number guessing game to consolidate learned concepts.  This project should incorporate user input, conditional statements, loops, and functions.
